title: Kant-Studien
additional-note: This is a German publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. Penn's Franklin record for this serial mentions both Berlin and New York as publisher locations.  We are not sure which issues were originally published in both places, but the title page of the first volume mentions a New York distributor.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
